name: A Powerful King
description:
Made for 

SM TAFE - Alpha @S!F End of Semester Game Jam 3

Play as a man with a top hat as he fights the king of Scotland and breaks all his stuff!

Your equipped with your trusty sword that can either swing left to right or spin around, both dealing with all the enemies and breakable stuff with ease.

---=Controls=---

  • Mouse to Aim
  • WASD to Move
  • Left-Click to Attack
  • Hold Right-Click to Spin Attack

---------------------

This game was made in 3 days for the end of semester game jam for my TAFE. There will be bugs and some unfinished content found within the current build. I have no plans to fix them but I might someday.

---=Credits=---
